name: [LD47] RoboBlast
description:
NOTE: It takes time to load... The Windows Build was uploaded after the end of gamejam. But no changes where made to the game!

RoboBlast is a 2.5D Circle-Action-Shooter with Rage-Game elements.

Trapped in an everrepeating loop of circular space modules, you are a robot fighting to escape the aliens..

Controls:
  • A, D - Move
  • W - Jump
  • Arrow Keys - Shoot
  • Control the menus by shooting and moving
  • We implemented two different camera modes, feel free to test both in the menu before continueing 
Play RoboBlast
  • Adapt to the wierd physics of RoboBlast!
  • Dodge vicious attacks!
  • Avoid Mistakes!
  • Fight back!!
Team
  • Claudia Riegger
  • Janik Helbig
  • Marian Becher
